name: Wiskered Warriors
description:
Whiskered Warriors is a game inspired by Punch Out and other early arcade games. Made in 36 Hours for VTHAX.

Note: Sword attacks can only be dodged. Projectiles can "only" be blocked.

Controls (Controller Support Included):

<- or A: Dodge

Space or A Button: Attack

Shift or B Button: Block (while in front position)

Music: "A Robust Crew" by Daren Curtis
